overview.paragraph: The REG_NAMESPACE macro registers a top-level namespace with the library. Nested namespaces are registered with the REG_NAMESPACE_TOP_LEVEL macro.

macro.name: REG_NAMESPACE_TOP_LEVEL
macro.arg: The name of the top-level namespace being registered. The argument must be a valid namespace identifier.

overview.paragraph: The namespace alias for the registered namespace is defined by this macro as _##NAMESPACE_NAME.

cpp_line.cpp_comment: // the macros must be used in the boost::mirror namespace
